name: Ludum Dare Simulator
description:
I was busy with life stuff most of the compo so I wasn't able to do a whole lot, so this is a pretty half-baked little game. Also Construct 3 kept freezing when saving sprites so I had to stop. With all that said this is pretty darn good considering the circumstances.

It was supposed to be a team getting ready to jam for Ludum Dare, but then they saw the theme...

I might not have been able to do a lot this LD, but I'm very happy of what I got done, and I wish everyone the best of luck with the competition!
